title: Chapter 336: Formulating Plan
body:
Chapter 336: Formulating Plan

Formulating Plan


“These demon soldiers are the secret weapon of Demon clan—- Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier!” Looking at those demon soldiers in the middle of blood colored pond, Ren Tianyou slowly explained to everyone.


“Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier? What is this?” The crowd couldn’t help but ask confusedly.


“Do you all think that Demon clan had nothing to do and build such a place dedicated to torturing our clansmen? They are using that blood filled with resentment qi of those tortured to death clansmen to complete this magic formation.” Ren Tianyou pointed that huge magic formation ahead and slowly said.


“You all can perceive that these demon soldiers are dead long ago, and they are merely a corpse without any consciousness. But Demon clan use this magic formation to inject baleful resentment power into these corpses, allowing them to gradually restore their strength before death, then controlling them using a secret technique, they turn them into a killing machine.”


“Furthermore the most terrifying matter is, the attack of these Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier contain baleful resentment power, if one suffers even a single wound from these Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier, then the baleful resentment power will enter into their body, which will then infiltrate deep into their body, changing them into similar Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier without any consciousness, this is very troublesome.”


“Didn’t expect these demons still have such hidden trump, if you didn’t inform in advance, then we’d have absolutely paid bitterly.” Looking at Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier, Ling Xiaotian solemnly sighed, and became grateful to Ren Tianyou.


“Indeed, the strength of these Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier in itself is not too hard to deal with, although they don’t have any consciousness, don’t know pain, and even if they are able to recover their strength before death, that is not too much of a problem. The main problem is these baleful resentment power.” Brilliant also nodded his head and said.


If you are wounded even once, the baleful resentment power would change them into similar Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier, this made everyone present to feel thorny.


“Well, now you’ve seen all the things you should see, so let’s return to reality first, and then discuss together about how to deal with these Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier.” Ren Tianyou nodded his head, then said to everyone present. After that, stretching out is right hand, Ren Tianyou snapped his fingers. Along with this sound, everybody only felt their vision blurring, and they had already return back to the square of Holy Light Hill.


“Still truly a mystical illusion technique.” Seeing the surrounding environment, as well as the stool where they were sitting hadn’t move even a bit, it was basically unthinkable that all of these people had gone to another place just a moment ago.


“As a matter of fact, I have a way to somewhat restrain these Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier.” Just then, Brilliant slowly opened his mouth.


“Oh? You have? Then why don’t you quickly tell us how to deal with these troublesome things?” Ling Xiaotian hastily asked.


“This baleful resentment power is actually a part of dark energy, if we use light magic, fire magic and Elf clan’s life magic, then I believe these three magic can definitely deal with these Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier.” Brilliant slowly expressed his view.


“It make sense, light in itself is bane of dark, although the power of fire magic is not as good as light magic to cope with dark magic, but fire magic is much stronger compared to other magic. And the life magic of Elf clan along with light magic are called the two great nemesis of dark magic.” Ling Xiaotian nodded his head, then said, “Now that this is the case, our plan is changed, we will take out some excellent light magician from sixth medical unit, then take out half of total fire magicians and everyone of Elf clan from other units to deal with these Demon Spirit Baleful Soldiers. As for the leadership of this group, it will be given to……”


When speaking about who to give the leadership, Ling Xiaotian was unable to think of a suitable person for the time being.


“Give it to our Akatsuki’s Azure Dragon, Vermilion Bird and Northern Dipper.” Ren Tianyou stood up and said to Ling Xiaotian. “They are fire and light cultivators, and they have great restraint against these Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier.”


“Well, the team of Akatsuki’s three people will lead this unit. Hope you all will be able to succeed in blocking Demon Spirit Baleful Soldier of Demon clan at that time.” Ling Xiaotian thought for a brief, then agreed to the opinion of Ren Tianyou.


“Furthermore, I don’t want to lead fourth unit, you can give it to White Tiger, and all the remaining members of my Akatsuki including White Tiger will assist this unit.”


“You don’t want to lead this unit?” Hearing Ren Tianyou, Ling Xiaotian couldn’t help but exclaim in surprise.


“I don’t want to, I will move freely and that will suffice. Since you all will lead experts to block Three Great Demon God of Demon clan, then it’d be better to let me deal with the Demon Empress of Demon clan.” Ren Tianyou slowly said.


“You want to deal with Demon Empress? Then do you need the help of our experts?” Hearing Ren Tianyou wanted to deal with Demon Empress, everyone present were greatly shocked, they thought that Ren Tianyou was intentionally cracking a joke, but thinking of that illusion of just now, they also felt that his strength might be higher than everyone present here.


“No need, you will only hold me back. Without God Emperor realm in strength, it is basically impossible to injure Demon Empress, otherwise why do you think that Seven Great Saints burned their blood lineage and life?” Ren Tianyou shook his head, and refused the kindness of Ling Xiaotian, “Moreover, sooner or later Demon Empress and I must fight, this fight will be the continuation of our last time’s unfished battle.”


“Unfinished battle? Don’t tell me that you and Demon Empress clashed?” Hearing Ren Tianyou, Brilliant exclaimed in surprise.


“Yeah, we clashed.” Ren Tianyou nodded his head, then disregarding the shock and astonishment of the crowds, he continued, “and more than once.”


Ren Tianyou said these because he wanted a deterrence force, and this will be convent for him to move without any interference or questioning.


“Since that is the case, then I hope you can really stop Demon Empress, after all currently we do not have any way to deal with Demon Empress, as all the original Seven Great Saints no longer exists.” Ling Xiaotian slowly sighed and said, “But at that time, if you need any help, feel free to ask.”


“Okay.” Ren Tianyou nodded his head without any refusal.


Next, the gathering continued to discuss and formulate the details of plan. All in all this was a battle concerning the continuation of Divine Wind Continent and every races, basically unable to be bear any carelessness. This gathering continued for nearly 10 hours before it gradually ended.
